MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  L31 postcode area of Melling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:30AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing network investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:27AM on 29th March 2021.
